Room.Name: Boran's Gate
Room.ShortDescription: This is the north end of Boran Street, near the village wall.
Room.LongDescription: There is a gate across the street which leads farther to the north, and a very big hut nearby. You can hear the sound of snoring coming from inside the hut. A stone building is across from the hut on the east side of the street, and a sign above the door says, "Community Warehouse."
